description: This table contains the claim action histories for the claim print records associated with the hospital account/liability bucket.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim record associated with a single hospital account.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date for the creation of the record in internal format. (There is only one contact date per claim print record.)

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CLM_ACTION_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of claim action that was taken.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Viewed


Refreshed


Comment Added


Submitted


Force Submitted


Created


Processed


Accepted


Resubmitted


Printed to Paper


Filed Electronically


EOB Printed


Removed From Queue


Edited Claim


Forced to Paper


Cancel Claim Created


Sent to External Grouper


Received Update From External Grouper


Sent Claim to Claim Edit Workqueue


Added Late Charges


Auto-processed by External Grouper


Reset Edited Values


Replaced Corrected Charge


Removed Reversed Charge


Rapid Retest: Sent Claim


Rapid Retest: Received Update


Rapid Retest: Transmission Failed


Rapid Retest: Response Timed Out


Demand Claim Print Failed


Changed Bundled Episode

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account with which this claim record is associated.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWN_ID
columns.description: ID of the physical deployment owner for this record. Physical owners will be where the data is hosted, either on the cross-over server or the owner deployment.

columns.name: CLM_HIST_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID who performed claim action for the claim record.

columns.name: CLM_HIST_CMT_PTR
columns.description: The pointer to the comments for the claim action for the claim record.

columns.name: CLM_HIST_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the claim action was performed.
